ch.nolix.common.specification

Interface Specifiable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resettable, Typed
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Configurable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Area, BackgroundColor, BlackNBlueDesign, Boolean, BorderableRectangle, Button, Cell, CheckBox, CloseCommand, Color, ColorGradient, Column, Command, ConfigurableElement, Configuration, ConfigurationElement, Container, Database, DeepConfiguration, DefaultDesign, Definition, Design, Design, Dialog, DialogContainer, Element, Equality, Expression, Frame, GraphicText, GreenDesign, Header, Height, HorizontalLine, HorizontalStack, InnerDialog, Integer, Label, LeftClickCommand, Length, Line, Margin, MathBook, MinHeight, MinWidth, MockDialog, NamableElement, Name, NonEmptyText, NonNegativeInteger, OptionalNamableElement, PositiveInteger, Rectangle, RightClickCommand, Row, Scope, SingleContainer, Size, Stack, StandardConfiguration, TabContainer, TabContainerTab, Table, Text, TextBox, TextColor, TextLineRectangle, TextSize, Theory, Title, Token, VerticalLine, VerticalStack, Width

    public interface Specifiable
extends Typed, Resettable
    A specifiable object is a typed object with the properties: -All official attributes can be got from together. -All official attributes can be set to uniquely. -All official attributes can be reset together.
